T. Teijeiro
A. Sauty
D. Atienza
dcterms:description: The only known open dataset to delineate the start and stop times of each individual cough sound. It contains audio and kinematic data from healthy subjects performing forced coughs, breathing, throat clearing, speaking, and laughing.
dcterms:title: A Multimodal Dataset for Automatic Edge-AI Cough Detection

dcterms:creator: L. Orlandic
J. Dan
J. Thevenot
T. Teijeiro
A. Sauty
D. Atienza
dcterms:description: The COUGHVID dataset is used to augment the training dataset with cough samples to enhance the generalizability of the algorithm to unseen test subjects and balance the data classes.
dcterms:title: COUGHVID dataset
